item.title: Tactical versus strategic coding
item.description: Vacation time for me generally means reading time and for this occasion I brought “A philosophy of software design” by John Ousterhout with me. So over the course of a few warm summer evenings I read my way through it and here are some thoughts and an interesting thing I picked up. Many things that the book covered were more or less in the tool belt, a refresher is always nice and I agree with most of the things the book describes.
